name: bulbasaur
desc: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seed on its back in order to grow.

name: ivysaur
desc: Exposure to sunlight adds to its strength. Sunlight also makes the bud on its back grow larger.

name: venusaur
desc: A bewitching aroma wafts from its flower. The fragrance becalms those engaged in a battle.

name: charmander
desc: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

name: charmander
desc: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

name: charmeleon
desc: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

name: charmeleon
desc: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

name: charizard
desc: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

name: charizard
desc: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

name: squirtle
desc: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force

name: Warturtle
desc: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.

name: blastoise
desc: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

name: caterpie
desc: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.

name: metapod
desc: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.

name: butterfree
desc: It collects honey every day. It rubs honey onto the hairs on its legs to carry it back to its nest.

name: diglett
desc: If a Diglett digs through a field, it leaves the soil perfectly tilled and ideal for planting crops

name: dugtrio
desc: A team of Diglett triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

name: meowth
desc: It loves to collect shiny things. If it’s in a good mood, it might even let its Trainer have a look at its hoard of treasures.

name: persian
desc: Getting this prideful Pokémon to warm up to you takes a lot of effort, and it will claw at you the moment it gets annoyed

name: psyduck
desc: Psyduck is constantly beset by headaches. If the Pokémon lets its strange power erupt, apparently the pain subsides for a while.

name: golduck
desc: This Pokémon lives in gently flowing rivers. It paddles through the water with its long limbs, putting its graceful swimming skills on display.

name: mankey
desc: An agile Pokémon that lives in trees. It angers easily and will not hesitate to attack anything.

name: primape
desc: It stops being angry only when nobody else is around. To view this moment is very difficult

name: growlithe
desc: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.

name: arcanine
desc: The sight of it running over 6,200 miles in a single day and night has captivated many people.

name: poliwag
desc: For Poliwag, swimming is easier than walking. The swirl pattern on its belly is actually part of the Pokémon’s innards showing through the skin.

name: poliwhirl
desc: Staring at the swirl on its belly causes drowsiness. This trait of Poliwhirl’s has been used in place of lullabies to get children to go to sleep.

name: poliwrath
desc: Its body is solid muscle. When swimming through cold seas, Poliwrath uses its impressive arms to smash through drift ice and plow forward.

name: abra
desc: This Pokémon uses its psychic powers while it sleeps. The contents of Abra’s dreams affect the powers that the Pokémon wields.

name: kadabra
desc: Using its psychic power, Kadabra levitates as it sleeps. It uses its springy tail as a pillow

name: alakazam
desc: It has an incredibly high level of intelligence. Some say that Alakazam remembers everything that ever happens to it, from birth till death.

name: machop
desc: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it’s the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.

name: machoke
desc: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

name: machamp
desc: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.

name: bellsprout
desc: Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny bugs with its vines and devours them

name: weepinbell
desc: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is dissolved by strong acids.

name: victreebel
desc: Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is dissolved in a day, bones and all.

name: tentacool
desc: Tentacool is not a particularly strong swimmer. It drifts across the surface of shallow seas as it searches for prey.

name: tentacruel
desc: When the red orbs on Tentacruel’s head glow brightly, watch out. The Pokémon is about to fire off a burst of ultrasonic waves.

name: geodude
desc: Commonly found near mountain trails and the like. If you step on one by accident, it gets angry.

name: graveler
desc: Often seen rolling down mountain trails. Obstacles are just things to roll straight over, not avoid.

name: golem
desc: Once it sheds its skin, its body turns tender and whitish. Its hide hardens when it’s exposed to air.

name: golem-alola
desc: It uses magnetism to accelerate and fire off rocks tinged with electricity. Even if it doesn’t score a direct hit, the jolt of electricity will do the job.

name: ponyta
desc: It can’t run properly when it’s newly born. As it races around with others of its kind, its legs grow stronger.

name: ponyta-galar
desc: Its small horn hides a healing power. With a few rubs from this Pokémon’s horn, any slight wound you have will be healed.

name: rapidash
desc: This Pokémon can be seen galloping through fields at speeds of up to 150 mph, its fiery mane fluttering in the wind.

name: slowpoke
desc: Slow-witted and oblivious, this Pokémon won’t feel any pain if its tail gets eaten. It won’t notice when its tail grows back, either.

name: slowbro
desc: Slowpoke became Slowbro when a Shellder bit on to its tail. Sweet flavors seeping from the tail make the Shellder feel as if its life is a dream.

name: magnemite
desc: At times, Magnemite runs out of electricity and ends up on the ground. If you give batteries to a grounded Magnemite, it’ll start moving again.

name: magneton
desc: This Pokémon is three Magnemite that have linked together. Magneton sends out powerful radio waves to study its surroundings.

name: farfetch'd
desc: The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wings serves as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire situation, the stalk can also serve as food.

name: doduo
desc: Its short wings make flying difficult. Instead, this Pokémon runs at high speed on developed legs.

name: dodrio
desc: One of Doduo’s two heads splits to form a unique species. It runs close to 40 mph in prairies

name: seel
desc: Loves freezing-cold conditions. Relishes swimming in a frigid climate of around 14 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: dewgong
desc: Its entire body is a snowy white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters.

name: grimer
desc: Made of congealed sludge. It smells too putrid to touch. Even weeds won’t grow in its path.

name: muk
desc: Smells so awful, it can cause fainting. Through degeneration of its nose, it lost its sense of smell.

name: shelder
desc: It swims facing backward by opening and closing its two-piece shell. It is surprisingly fast.

name: cloyster
desc: Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered, even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it is attacking.

name: gastly
desc: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.

name: haunter
desc: Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim starts shaking constantly until death eventually comes.

name: gengar
desc: On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be Gengar’s doing.

name: onix
desc: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.

name: drowzee
desc: If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes show you dreams it had eaten in the past.

name: Hypno
desc: Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum

name: krabby
desc: It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.

name: kingler
desc: Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.

name: voltorb
desc: It is said to camouflage itself as a Poké Ball. It will self-destruct with very little stimulus.

name: electrode
desc: Stores electrical energy inside its body. Even the slightest shock could trigger a huge explosion.

name: exeggute
desc: Though it may look like it’s just a bunch of eggs, it’s a proper Pokémon. Exeggcute communicates with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently.

name: exeggutor
desc: Each of Exeggutor’s three heads is thinking different thoughts. The three don’t seem to be very interested in one another.

name: cubone
desc: When the memory of its departed mother brings it to tears, its cries echo mournfully within the skull it wears on its head.

name: marowak
desc: This Pokémon overcame its sorrow to evolve a sturdy new body. Marowak faces its opponents bravely, using a bone as a weapon.

name: hitmonlee
desc: This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position.

name: hitmonchan
desc: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.

name: lickitung
desc: If this Pokémon’s sticky saliva gets on you and you don’t clean it off, an intense itch will set in. The itch won’t go away, either.

name: koffing
desc: Its body is full of poisonous gas. It floats into garbage dumps, seeking out the fumes of raw, rotting trash.

name: weezing
desc: It mixes gases between its two bodies. It’s said that these Pokémon were seen all over the Galar region back in the day.

name: rhyhorn
desc: Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging tackles.

name: rhydon
desc: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.

name: pansear
desc: This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: chansey
desc: The egg Chansey carries is not only delicious but also packed with nutrition. It’s used as a high-class cooking ingredient.

name: tangela
desc: Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that grows nonstop even if the vines are torn off, this Pokémon’s true appearance remains a mystery.

name: panpour
desc: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.

name: kangaskan
desc: Although it’s carrying its baby in a pouch on its belly, Kangaskhan is swift on its feet. It intimidates its opponents with quick jabs.

name: simipour
desc: The high-pressure water expelled from its tail is so powerful, it can destroy a concrete wall.

name: horsea
desc: Horsea makes its home in oceans with gentle currents. If this Pokémon is under attack, it spits out pitch-black ink and escapes.

name: munna
desc: It eats dreams and releases mist. The mist is pink when it’s eating a good dream, and black when it’s eating a nightmare.

name: seadra
desc: It’s the males that raise the offspring. While Seadra are raising young, the spines on their backs secrete thicker and stronger poison.

name: musharna
desc: When dark mists emanate from its body, don’t get too near. If you do, your nightmares will become reality.

name: goldeen
desc: Its dorsal, pectoral, and tail fins wave elegantly in water. That is why it is known as the Water Dancer.

name: pidove
desc: It’s forgetful and not very bright, but many Trainers love it anyway for its friendliness and sincerity.

name: seaking
desc: In autumn, its body becomes more fatty in preparing to propose to a mate. It takes on beautiful colors.

name: staryu
desc: If you visit a beach at the end of summer, you’ll be able to see groups of Staryu lighting up in a steady rhythm.

name: starmie
desc: This Pokémon has an organ known as its core. The organ glows in seven colors when Starmie is unleashing its potent psychic powers.

name: mr. mime
desc: The broadness of its hands may be no coincidence—many scientists believe its palms became enlarged specifically for pantomiming.

name: scyther
desc: As Scyther fights more and more battles, its scythes become sharper and sharper. With a single slice, Scyther can fell a massive tree.

name: jynx
desc: In certain parts of Galar, Jynx was once feared and worshiped as the Queen of Ice.

name: electabuzz
desc: Many power plants keep Ground-type Pokémon around as a defense against Electabuzz that come seeking electricity.

name: misdreavus
desc: What makes it happy is imitating the voices of weeping people and scaring everyone. It doesn’t deal well with folks who aren’t easily frightened.

name: unown
desc: This Pokémon is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various Unown. Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.

name: wobbuffet
desc: To keep its pitch-black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the darkness. It is never first to attack.

name: girafarig
desc: Girafarig’s rear head contains a tiny brain that is too small for thinking. However, the rear head doesn’t need to sleep, so it can keep watch over its surroundings 24 hours a day.

name: pineco
desc: It sticks tree bark to itself with its saliva, making itself thicker and larger. Elderly Pineco are ridiculously huge.

name: forretress
desc: In the moment that it gulps down its prey, the inside of its shell is exposed, but to this day, no one has ever seen that sight.

name: Dunsparce
desc: This Pokémon’s tiny wings have some scientists saying that Dunsparce used to fly through the sky in ancient times.

name: gligar
desc: Gligar glides through the air without a sound as if it were sliding. This Pokémon hangs on to the face of its foe using its clawed hind legs and the large pincers on its forelegs, then injects the prey with its poison barb.

name: steelix
desc: It is thought its body transformed as a result of iron accumulating internally from swallowing soil.

name: snubbull
desc: In contrast to its appearance, it’s quite timid. When playing with other puppy Pokémon, it sometimes gets bullied.

name: granbull
desc: While it has powerful jaws, it doesn’t care for disputes, so it rarely has a chance to display their might.

name: skitty
desc: Skitty is known to chase around playfully after its own tail. In the wild, this Pokémon lives in holes in the trees of forests. It is very popular as a pet because of its adorable looks.

name: delcatty
desc: Delcatty sleeps anywhere it wants without keeping a permanent nest. If other Pokémon approach it as it sleeps, this Pokémon will never fight—it will just move away somewhere else.

name: sableye
desc: This Pokémon is feared. When its gemstone eyes begin to glow with a sinister shine, it’s believed that Sableye will steal people’s spirits away.

name: mawile
desc: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.

name: aron
desc: It eats iron ore—and sometimes railroad tracks—to build up the steel armor that protects its body.

name: lairon
desc: Lairon live in mountains brimming with spring water and iron ore, so these Pokémon often came into conflict with humans in the past.

name: aggron
desc: Aggron has a horn sharp enough to perforate thick iron sheets. It brings down its opponents by ramming into them horn first.

name: meditite
desc: Meditite heightens its inner energy through meditation. It survives on just one berry a day. Minimal eating is another aspect of this Pokémon’s training.

name: medicham
desc: Through the power of meditation, Medicham developed its sixth sense. It gained the ability to use psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon is known to meditate for a whole month without eating.

name: electrike
desc: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.

name: manectric
desc: It stimulates its own muscles with electricity, so it can move quickly. It eases its soreness with electricity, too, so it can recover quickly as well.

name: plusle
desc: When Plusle is cheering on its partner, it flashes with electric sparks from all over its body. If its partner loses, this Pokémon cries loudly.

name: minun
desc: Minun loves to cheer on its partner in battle. It gives off sparks from its body while it is doing so. If its partner is in trouble, this Pokémon gives off increasing amounts of sparks.

name: volbeat
desc: Volbeat’s tail glows like a lightbulb. With other Volbeat, it uses its tail to draw geometric shapes in the night sky. This Pokémon loves the sweet aroma given off by Illumise.

name: illumise
desc: Illumise leads a flight of illuminated Volbeat to draw signs in the night sky. This Pokémon is said to earn greater respect from its peers by composing more complex designs in the sky.

name: roselia
desc: It uses the different poisons in each hand separately when it attacks. The stronger its aroma, the healthier it is.

name: gulpin
desc: Most of Gulpin’s body is made up of its stomach—its heart and brain are very small in comparison. This Pokémon’s stomach contains special enzymes that dissolve anything.

name: swalot
desc: Swalot has no teeth, so what it eats, it swallows whole, no matter what. Its cavernous mouth yawns widely. An automobile tire could easily fit inside this Pokémon’s mouth.

name: carvanha
desc: These Pokémon have sharp fangs and powerful jaws. Sailors avoid Carvanha dens at all costs.

name: sharpedo
desc: This Pokémon is known as the Bully of the Sea. Any ship entering the waters Sharpedo calls home will be attacked—no exceptions.

name: wailmer
desc: When it sucks in a large volume of seawater, it becomes like a big, bouncy ball. It eats a ton of food daily.

name: wailord
desc: Its immense size is the reason for its popularity. Wailord watching is a favorite sightseeing activity in various parts of the world.

name: numel
desc: Numel stores magma of almost 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit within its body. If it gets wet, the magma cools and hardens. In that event, the Pokémon’s body grows heavy and its movements become sluggish.

name: camerupt
desc: The humps on Camerupt’s back are formed by a transformation of its bones. They sometimes blast out molten magma. This Pokémon apparently erupts often when it is enraged.

name: torkoal
desc: You find abandoned coal mines full of them. They dig tirelessly in search of coal.

name: spoink
desc: Spoink keeps a pearl on top of its head. The pearl functions to amplify this Pokémon’s psychokinetic powers. It is therefore on a constant search for a bigger pearl.

name: gumpig
desc: Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to wield its fantastic powers. When it is doing so, it dances bizarrely. This Pokémon’s black pearls are valuable as works of art.

name: spinda
desc: Each Spinda’s spot pattern is different. With its stumbling movements, it evades opponents’ attacks brilliantly!

name: trapinch
desc: It makes an inescapable conical pit and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.

name: vibrava
desc: To help make its wings grow, it dissolves quantities of prey in its digestive juices and guzzles them down every day.

name: flygon
desc: It is nicknamed the Desert Spirit because the flapping of its wings sounds like a woman singing.

name: cacnea
desc: The more arid and harsh the environment, the more pretty and fragrant a flower Cacnea grows. This Pokémon battles by wildly swinging its thorny arms.

name: cacturne
desc: If a traveler is going through a desert in the thick of night, Cacturne will follow in a ragtag group. The Pokémon are biding their time, waiting for the traveler to tire and become incapable of moving.

name: swablu
desc: Since Swablu looks like a cumulus cloud, foes can have a hard time finding it. Apparently its wings turned white over many generations.

name: altaria
desc: This Pokémon has a kind disposition, but if it’s provoked, it will threaten opponents with shrill cries before attacking them without mercy.

name: zangoose
desc: Zangoose usually stays on all fours, but when angered, it gets up on its hind legs and extends its claws. This Pokémon shares a bitter rivalry with Seviper that dates back over generations.

name: seviper
desc: Seviper’s swordlike tail serves two purposes—it slashes foes and douses them with secreted poison. This Pokémon will not give up its long-running blood feud with Zangoose.

name: lunatone
desc: It was discovered at the site of a meteor strike 40 years ago. Its stare can lull its foes to sleep.

name: solrock
desc: Solar energy is the source of its power, so it is strong during the daytime. When it spins, its body shines.

name: barboach
desc: It probes muddy riverbeds with its two long whiskers. A slimy film protects its body.

name: whiscash
desc: It claims a large swamp to itself. If a foe comes near it, it sets off tremors by thrashing around.

name: corphish
desc: It was originally a Pokémon from afar that escaped to the wild. It can adapt to the dirtiest river.

name: crawdaunt
desc: A brutish Pokémon that loves to battle. It will crash itself into any foe that approaches its nest.

name: baltoy
desc: It was discovered in ancient ruins. While moving, it constantly spins. It stands on one foot even when asleep.

name: claydol
desc: It appears to have been born from clay dolls made by ancient people. It uses telekinesis to float and move.

name: lileep
desc: Lileep clings to rocks on the seabed. When prey comes close, this Pokémon entangles it with petallike tentacles.

name: cradily
desc: Once Cradily catches prey in its tentacles, it digests them whole and absorbs their nutrients.

name: anorith
desc: Anorith can swim swiftly by pulling its eight wings through the water like oars on a boat. This Pokémon is an ancestor of modern bug Pokémon.

name: armaldo
desc: Though it lives on land, it’s also a good swimmer. It dives into the ocean in search of prey, using its sharp claws to take down its quarry.

name: feebas
desc: It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is very hardy and can survive on little water.

name: milotic
desc: It’s said that a glimpse of a Milotic and its beauty will calm any hostile emotions you’re feeling.

name: castform
desc: Its form changes depending on the weather. The rougher conditions get, the rougher Castform’s disposition!

name: shuppet
desc: There’s a proverb that says, “Shun the house where Shuppet gather in the growing dusk.”

name: kacleon
desc: Its color changes for concealment and also when its mood or health changes. The darker the color, the healthier it is.

name: banette
desc: Resentment at being cast off made it spring into being. Some say that treating it well will satisfy it, and it will once more become a stuffed toy.

name: duskall
desc: Making itself invisible, it silently sneaks up to prey. It has the ability to slip through thick walls.

name: dusclops
desc: It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.

name: tropius
desc: Bunches of delicious fruit grow around its neck. In warm areas, many ranches raise Tropius.

name: chimecho
desc: In high winds, Chimecho cries as it hangs from a tree branch or the eaves of a building using a suction cup on its head. This Pokémon plucks berries with its long tail and eats them.

name: absol
desc: Because of this Pokémon’s ability to detect danger, people mistook Absol as a bringer of doom.

name: wynaut
desc: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.

name: snorunt
desc: It can only survive in cold areas. It bounces happily around, even in environments as cold as −150 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: glalie
desc: It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere. It uses this power to freeze its foes.

name: spheal
desc: As it drifts among the waves, Spheal probes the sea. As soon as it spots prey, it informs the Walrein in its herd.

name: sealeo
desc: This Pokémon has a habit of spinning round things on its nose, whether those things are Poké Balls or Spheal.

name: walrein
desc: Walrein’s tusks keep growing throughout its life. Tusks broken in battle will grow back to their usual impressive size in a year.

name: clamperl
desc: Clamperl’s pearls are exceedingly precious. They can be more than 10 times as costly as Shellder’s pearls.

name: huntil
desc: Deep seas are their habitat. According to tradition, when Huntail wash up onshore, something unfortunate will happen.

name: gorebyss
desc: It sucks bodily fluids out of its prey. The leftover meat sinks to the seafloor, where it becomes food for other Pokémon.

name: relicanth
desc: This Pokémon was discovered during deep-sea exploration. Its appearance hasn’t changed in 100,000,000 years, so it’s called a living fossil.

name: luvdisc
desc: Luvdisc makes its home in coral reefs in warm seas. It especially likes sleeping in the space between Corsola’s branches.

name: bagon
desc: Bagon is a solitary Pokémon that doesn’t form groups with others of its kind. It also has a head hard enough to cleave a boulder in one strike.

name: shelgon
desc: Shelgon ignores its hunger entirely, never eating any food. Apparently, Shelgon will evolve once all its energy stores are used up.

name: salamence
desc: While basking in the joy of flight generally keeps this Pokémon in high spirits, Salamence turns into an uncontrollable menace if something angers it.

name: beldum
desc: The cells in this Pokémon’s body are composed of magnetic material. Instead of blood, magnetic forces flow through Beldum’s body.

name: metang
desc: Using magnetic forces to stay aloft, this Pokémon flies at high speeds, weaving through harsh mountain terrain in pursuit of prey.

name: metagross
desc: Metagross is the result of the fusion of two Metang. This Pokémon defeats its opponents through use of its supercomputer-level brain.

name: regirock
desc: Cutting-edge technology was used to study the internals of this Pokémon’s rock body, but nothing was found—not even a brain or a heart.

name: regice
desc: This Pokémon’s body is made of solid ice. It’s said that Regice was born beneath thick ice in the ice age.

name: registeel
desc: It’s rumored that this Pokémon was born deep underground in the planet’s mantle and that it emerged onto the surface 10,000 years ago.

name: latias
desc: Latias is highly intelligent and capable of understanding human speech. It is covered with a glass-like down. The Pokémon enfolds its body with its down and refracts light to alter its appearance.

name: latios
desc: Latios will only open its heart to a Trainer with a compassionate spirit. This Pokémon can fly faster than a jet plane by folding its forelegs to minimize air resistance.

name: kyogre
desc: Kyogre is said to be the personification of the sea itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Groudon, as each sought to gain the power of nature.

name: groudon
desc: Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s full power, it will take back its true form. It can cause magma to erupt and expand the landmass of the world.

name: rayquaza
desc: It flies forever through the ozone layer, consuming meteoroids for sustenance. The many meteoroids in its body provide the energy it needs to Mega Evolve.

name: jirachi
desc: It’s believed that when this Pokémon wakes from its 1,000-year slumber, it will grant any wishes written on the notes attached to its head.

name: deoxys
desc: Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.

name: turtwig
desc: It undertakes photosynthesis with its body, making oxygen. The leaf on its head wilts if it is thirsty.

name: grotle
desc: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.

name: torterra
desc: Small Pokémon occasionally gather on its unmoving back to begin building their nests.

name: chimchar
desc: The gas made in its belly burns from its rear end. The fire burns weakly when it feels sick.

name: monferno
desc: It uses ceilings and walls to launch aerial attacks. Its fiery tail is but one weapon.

name: infenape
desc: It tosses its enemies around with agility. It uses all its limbs to fight in its own unique style.

name: piplup
desc: Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.

name: prinplup
desc: It lives a solitary life. Its wings deliver wicked blows that can snap even the thickest of trees.

name: empoleaon
desc: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.

name: starly
desc: They flock around mountains and fields, chasing after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy and annoying.

name: staravia
desc: It lives in forests and fields. Squabbles over territory occur when flocks collide.

name: staraptor
desc: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

name: bidoof
desc: It constantly gnaws on logs and rocks to whittle down its front teeth. It nests alongside water.

name: bibarel
desc: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker

name: cricketot
desc: When its antennae hit each other, it sounds like the music of a xylophone.

name: cricketune
desc: It signals its emotions with its melodies. Scientists are studying these melodic patterns

name: shinx
desc: Electricity makes this Pokémon’s fur glow. Shinx sends signals to others of its kind by shaking the tip of its tail while the tail tip is shining brightly.

name: luxio
desc: Upon encountering an opponent, this Pokémon prepares for battle by extending its claws, which can put out 1,000,000 volts of electricity.

name: luxray
desc: Seeing through solid objects uses up a lot of Luxray’s electricity, so the Pokémon sleeps for long periods of time to store up energy.

name: budew
desc: This Pokémon is highly sensitive to temperature changes. When its bud starts to open, that means spring is right around the corner.

name: roserade
desc: The poison in its right hand is quick acting. The poison in its left hand is slow acting. Both are life threatening.

name: cranidos
desc: Its hard skull is its distinguishing feature. It snapped trees by headbutting them, and then it fed on their ripe berries.

name: rampardos
desc: This ancient Pokémon used headbutts skillfully. Its brain was really small, so some theories suggest that its stupidity led to its extinction.

name: shieldon
desc: Although its fossils can be found in layers of primeval rock, nothing but its face has ever been discovered.

name: bastiodon
desc: This Pokémon is from roughly 100 million years ago. Its terrifyingly tough face is harder than steel.

name: burmy
desc: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.

name: wormadam
desc: When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokémon’s body. The cloak is never shed.

name: mothim
desc: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.

name: combee
desc: It ceaselessly gathers nectar from sunrise to sundown, all for the sake of Vespiquen and the swarm.

name: vespiquen
desc: Vespiquen that give off more pheromones have larger swarms of Combee attendants

name: pachirisu
desc: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity

name: buizel
desc: It inflates the flotation sac around its neck and pokes its head out of the water to see what is going on.

name: floatzel
desc: Its flotation sac developed as a result of pursuing aquatic prey. It can double as a rubber raft

name: cherubi
desc: The deeper a Cherubi’s red, the more nutrients it has stockpiled in its body. And the sweeter and tastier its small ball!

name: cherrim
desc: Its folded petals are pretty tough. Bird Pokémon can peck at them all they want, and Cherrim won’t be bothered at all.

name: shellos-east
desc: Its appearance changes depending on the environment. One theory suggests that living in cold seas causes Shellos to take on this form

name: gastrodon-east
desc: Its body is covered in a sticky slime. It’s very susceptible to dehydration, so it can’t spend too much time on land.

name: ambipom
desc: It uses its tails for everything. If it wraps both of its tails around you and gives you a squeeze, that’s proof it really likes you.

name: drifloon
desc: The gathering of many souls gave rise to this Pokémon. During humid seasons, they seem to appear in abundance

name: drifblim
desc: It grabs people and Pokémon and carries them off somewhere. Where do they go? Nobody knows.

name: buneary
desc: Buneary can attack by rolling up their ears and then striking with the force created by unrolling them. This attack becomes stronger with training.

name: lopunny
desc: Once hot seasons are over, Lopunny’s coat will be replaced with fur that holds a lot of insulating air in preparation for colder weather.

name: mismagius
desc: Its muttered curses can cause awful headaches or terrifying visions that torment others.

name: honchkrow
desc: Its goons take care of most of the fighting for it. The only time it dirties its own hands is in delivering a final blow to finish off an opponent.

name: glameow
desc: When it’s happy, Glameow demonstrates beautiful movements of its tail, like a dancing ribbon.

name: purugly
desc: To make itself appear intimidatingly beefy, it tightly cinches its waist with its twin tails.

name: chingling
desc: There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops, the orb bounces all over and makes a ringing sound.

name: stunky
desc: If it lifts its tail and points its rear at you, beware. It’s about to spray you with a fluid stinky enough to make you faint

name: skuntank
desc: It digs holes in the ground to make its nest. The stench of the fluid it lets fly from the tip of its tail is extremely potent.

name: bronzor
desc: Polishing Bronzor to a shine makes its surface reflect the truth, according to common lore. Be that as it may, Bronzor hates being polished.

name: bronzong
desc: Many scientists suspect that this Pokémon originated outside the Galar region, based on the patterns on its body.

name: bonsly
desc: This Pokémon lives in dry, rocky areas. As its green spheres dry out, their dull luster increases

name: mime jr
desc: It looks for a Mr. Rime that’s a good dancer and carefully copies the Mr. Rime’s steps like an apprentice.

name: happiny
desc: Happiny’s willing to lend its precious round stone to those it’s friendly with, but if the stone isn’t returned, Happiny will cry and throw a tantrum

name: chatot
desc: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.

name: spritomb
desc: All Spiritomb’s mischief and misdeeds compelled a traveler to use a mysterious spell to bind Spiritomb to an odd keystone

name: gible
desc: Gible attacks anything that moves, and it drags whatever it catches into the crevice that is its lair. Despite the big mouth, Gible’s stomach is small.

name: gabite
desc: Jewels are buried in the caves these Pokémon nest in, but you’ll be torn apart by claws and fangs the moment you enter one of these caves.

name: garchomp
desc: Garchomp is fast both underground and above. It can bring down prey and return to its den before its body has chilled from being outside

name: munchlax
desc: It stores food beneath its fur. It might share just one bite, but only if it really trusts you

name: riolu
desc: It can use waves called auras to gauge how others are feeling. These same waves can also tell this Pokémon about the state of the environment.

name: lucario
desc: It can tell what people are thinking. Only Trainers who have justice in their hearts can earn this Pokémon’s trust.

name: hippopotas
desc: This Pokémon is active during the day and passes the cold desert nights burrowed snugly into the sand.

name: hippowdon
desc: When roused to violence by its rage, it spews out the quantities of sand it has swallowed and whips up a sandstorm.

name: emboar
desc: It can throw a fire punch by setting its fists on fire with its fiery chin. It cares deeply about its friends. (gen X)

name: oshawott
desc: The scalchop on its stomach isn’t just used for battle—it can be used to break open hard berries as well. (omega Ruby)

name: dewott
desc: Strict training is how it learns its flowing double-scalchop technique. (Omega Ruby)

name: samurott
desc: One swing of the sword incorporated in its armour can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them quiets everybody.

name: patrat
desc: Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep watch for days. They use their tails to communicate with others

name: watchog
desc: Using luminescent matter, it makes its eyes and body glow and stuns attacking opponents.

name: lillipup
desc: This Pokémon is far brighter than the average child, and Lillipup won’t forget the love it receives or any abuse it suffers.

name: herdier
desc: Herdier is a very smart and friendly Pokémon. So much so that there’s a theory that Herdier was the first Pokémon to partner with people.

name: stoutland
desc: Stoutland is immensely proud of its impressive moustache. It’s said that moustache length is what determines social standing among this species.

name: purrloin
desc: Opponents that get drawn in by its adorable behavior come away with stinging scratches from its claws and stinging pride from its laughter.

name: liepard
desc: Don’t be fooled by its gorgeous fur and elegant figure. This is a moody and vicious Pokémon.

name: pansage
desc: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokémon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.

name: simisage
desc: It attacks enemies with strikes of its thorn-covered tail. This Pokémon is wild tempered.

name: simisear
desc: When it gets excited, embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it loves sweets.

name: tranquill
desc: It can fly moderately quickly. No matter how far it travels, it can always find its way back to its master and its nest.

name: unfezant
desc: This Pokémon is intelligent and intensely proud. People will sit up and take notice if you become the Trainer of one.

name: blitzle
desc: When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear. It can catch lightning with its mane and store the electricity.

name: zebstrika
desc: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.

name: roggenrola
desc: When it detects a noise, it starts to move. The energy core inside it makes this Pokémon slightly warm to the touch.

name: boldore
desc: If you see its orange crystals start to glow, be wary. It’s about to fire off bursts of energy.

name: gigalith
desc: This hardy Pokémon can often be found on construction sites and in mines, working alongside people and Copperajah.

name: woobat
desc: While inside a cave, if you look up and see lots of heart-shaped marks lining the walls, it’s evidence that Woobat live there.

name: swoobat
desc: The auspicious shape of this Pokémon’s nose apparently led some regions to consider Swoobat a symbol of good luck.

name: drilbur
desc: It brings its claws together and whirls around at high speed before rushing toward its prey.

name: Excadrill
desc: Known as the Drill King, this Pokémon can tunnel through the terrain at speeds of over 90 mph.

name: audino
desc: Audino’s sense of hearing is superb. Not even a pebble rolling along over a mile away will escape Audino’s ears.

name: timburr
desc: Timburr that have started carrying logs that are about three times their size are nearly ready to evolve.

name: gurdurr
desc: It shows off its muscles to Machoke and other Gurdurr. If it fails to measure up to the other Pokémon, it lies low for a little while.

name: conkeldurr
desc: When going all out, this Pokémon throws aside its concrete pillars and leaps at opponents to pummel them with its fists.

name: tympole
desc: It uses sound waves to communicate with others of its kind. People and other Pokémon species can’t hear its cries of warning.

name: palpitoad
desc: It weakens its prey with sound waves intense enough to cause headaches, then entangles them with its sticky tongue.

name: seismitoad
desc: This Pokémon is popular among the elderly, who say the vibrations of its lumps are great for massages.

name: throh
desc: They train in groups of five. Any member that can’t keep up will discard its belt and leave the group.

name: sawk
desc: The karate chops of a Sawk that’s trained itself to the limit can cleave the ocean itself.

name: sewaddle
desc: Since this Pokémon makes its own clothes out of leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.

name: swadloon
desc: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.

name: leavanny
desc: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.

name: venipede
desc: Its fangs are highly venomous. If this Pokémon finds prey it thinks it can eat, it leaps for them without any thought of how things might turn out.

name: whirlipede
desc: Curlipede Pokémon

name: scolipede
desc: Scolipede engage in fierce territorial battles with Centiskorch. At the end of one of these battles, the victor makes a meal of the loser.

name: cottonee
desc: Weaving together the cotton of both Cottonee and Eldegoss produces exquisite cloth that’s highly prized by many luxury brands.

name: petilil
desc: The deeper the color of a Petilil’s leaves, the healthier the Pokémon is. Petilil sometimes makes its home in a well-tended field or flowerbed.

name: lilligant
desc: Essential oils made from Lilligant flowers have a sublime scent, but they’re also staggeringly expensive.

name: basculin
desc: Known for their violence, these Pokémon have the most fights with schools of red-striped Basculin.

name: sandile
desc: Sandile is small, but its legs and lower body are powerful. Pushing sand aside as it goes, Sandile moves through the desert as if it’s swimming.

name: krokorok
desc: Although this Pokémon has specialized eyes that allow it to see in the dark, Krokorok won’t move much at night—the desert gets cold after sunset.

name: krookodile
desc: While terribly aggressive, Krookodile also has the patience to stay hidden under sand for days, lying in wait for prey.

name: darumaka
desc: This popular symbol of good fortune will never fall over in its sleep, no matter how it’s pushed or pulled.

name: darmanitan
desc: Its internal fire burns at 2,500 degrees Fahrenheit, making enough power that it can destroy a dump truck with one punch.

name: svyleon
desc: There’s a Galarian fairy tale that describes a beautiful Sylveon vanquishing a dreadful dragon Pokémon

name: hawlucha
desc: It always strikes a pose before going for its finishing move. Sometimes opponents take advantage of that time to counterattack.

name: dedenne
desc: A Dedenne’s whiskers pick up electrical waves other Dedenne send out. These Pokémon share locations of food or electricity with one another.

name: carbink
desc: It’s said that somewhere in the world, there’s a mineral vein housing a large pack of slumbering Carbink. It’s also said that this pack has a queen.

name: goomy
desc: Their horns are powerful sensors. As soon as Goomy pick up any sign of enemies, they go into hiding. This is how they’ve survived.

name: sliggoo
desc: The lump on its back contains its tiny brain. It thinks only of food and escaping its enemies.

name: goodra
desc: Sometimes it misunderstands instructions and appears dazed or bewildered. Many Trainers don’t mind, finding this behavior to be adorable.

name: klefki
desc: Klefki sucks in metal ions with the horn topping its head. It seems this Pokémon loves keys so much that its head needed to look like one, too.

name: phantump
desc: With a voice like a human child’s, it cries out to lure adults deep into the forest, getting them lost among the trees.

name: trevenant
desc: People fear it due to a belief that it devours any who try to cut down trees in its forest, but to the Pokémon it shares its woods with, it’s kind.

name: pumpkaboo
desc: The light that streams out from the holes in the pumpkin can hypnotize and control the people and Pokémon that see it.

name: gourgeist
desc: In the darkness of a new-moon night, Gourgeist will come knocking. Whoever answers the door will be swept off to the afterlife.

name: bergmite
desc: They chill the air around them to −150 degrees Fahrenheit, freezing the water in the air into ice that they use as armor.

name: avalugg
desc: As Avalugg moves about during the day, the cracks in its body deepen. The Pokémon’s body returns to a pristine state overnight.

name: noibat
desc: No wavelength of sound is beyond Noibat’s ability to produce. The ultrasonic waves it generates can overcome much larger Pokémon.

name: necrozma
desc: It survives by absorbing light. After a long time spent slumbering underground, impurities accumulated within it, causing its body to darken.

name: magearna
desc: Built roughly 500 years ago by a scientist, the part called the Soul-Heart is the actual life-form.

name: marshadow
desc: By slipping into the shadow of a martial arts master and copying their movements, this Pokémon learned the ultimate techniques.

name: poiple
desc: An Ultra Beast that lives in a different world, it cackles wildly as it sprays its opponents with poison from the needles on its head.

name: naganadel
desc: It stores hundreds of litters of poisonous liquid inside its body. It is one of the organisms known as UBs.

name: stakataka
desc: When stone walls started moving and attacking, the brute’s true identity was this mysterious life-form, which brings to mind an Ultra Beast.

name: blacephalon
desc: It slithers toward people. Then, without warning, it triggers the explosion of its own head. It’s apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.

name: zeraora
desc: Electricity sparks from the pads on its limbs. Wherever Zeraora runs, lightning flashes and thunder echoes.

name: meltan
desc: It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating liquid metal within its body is how it generates energy.

name: melmetal
desc: At the end of its life-span, Melmetal will rust and fall apart. The small shards left behind will eventually be reborn as Meltan.

name: grookey
desc: It attacks with rapid beats of its stick. As it strikes with amazing speed, it gets more and more pumped.

name: thwackey
desc: The faster a Thwackey can beat out a rhythm with its two sticks, the more respect it wins from its peers.

name: rillaboom
desc: The one with the best drumming techniques becomes the boss of the troop. It has a gentle disposition and values harmony among its group.

name: scorbunny
desc: It has special pads on the backs of its feet, and one on its nose. Once it’s raring to fight, these pads radiate tremendous heat.

name: raboot
desc: Its thick and fluffy fur protects it from the cold and enables it to use hotter fire moves

name: cinderace
desc: It juggles a pebble with its feet, turning it into a burning soccer ball. Its shots strike opponents hard and leave them scorched.

name: sobble
desc: When scared, this Pokémon cries. Its tears pack the chemical punch of 100 onions, and attackers won’t be able to resist weeping.

name: drizzile
desc: Highly intelligent but also very lazy, it keeps enemies out of its territory by laying traps everywhere.

name: inteleon
desc: Its nictitating membranes let it pick out foes’ weak points so it can precisely blast them with water that shoots from its fingertips at Mach 3.

name: skwovet
desc: Found throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon becomes uneasy if its cheeks are ever completely empty of berries.

name: greedent
desc: It stashes berries in its tail—so many berries that they fall out constantly. But this Pokémon is a bit slow-witted, so it doesn’t notice the loss.

name: rookidee
desc: Jumping nimbly about, this small-bodied Pokémon takes advantage of even the slightest opportunity to disorient larger opponents.

name: corvisquire
desc: The lessons of many harsh battles have taught it how to accurately judge an opponent’s strength.

name: corviknight
desc: This Pokémon reigns supreme in the skies of the Galar region. The black luster of its steel body could drive terror into the heart of any foe.

name: blipbug
desc: Often found in gardens, this Pokémon has hairs on its body that it uses to assess its surroundings.

name: dottler
desc: As it grows inside its shell, it uses its psychic abilities to monitor the outside world and prepare for evolution.

name: orbeetle
desc: It’s famous for its high level of intelligence, and the large size of its brain is proof that it also possesses immense psychic power.

name: orbeetle
desc: Its brain has grown to a gargantuan size, as has the rest of its body. This Pokémon’s intellect and psychic abilities are overpowering.

name: nicket
desc: Aided by the soft pads on its feet, it silently raids the food stores of other Pokémon. It survives off its ill-gotten gains.

name: thievul
desc: With a lithe body and sharp claws, it goes around stealing food and eggs. Boltund is its natural enemy.

name: gossifleur
desc: It whirls around in the wind while singing a joyous song. This delightful display has charmed many into raising this Pokémon.

name: eldegoss
desc: The cotton on the head of this Pokémon can be spun into a glossy, gorgeous yarn—a Galar regional specialty.

name: wooloo
desc: Its curly fleece is such an effective cushion that this Pokémon could fall off a cliff and stand right back up at the bottom, unharmed.

name: corviknight
desc: The eight feathers on its back are called blade birds, and they can launch off its body to attack foes independently.

name: dubwool
desc: Its majestic horns are meant only to impress the opposite gender. They never see use in battle.

name: chewtle
desc: Apparently the itch of its teething impels it to snap its jaws at anything in front of it.

name: drednaw
desc: This Pokémon rapidly extends its retractable neck to sink its sharp fangs into distant enemies and take them down.

name: yamper
desc: This Pokémon is very popular as a herding dog in the Galar region. As it runs, it generates electricity from the base of its tail.

name: grapploct
desc: Searching for an opponent to test its skills against, it emerges onto land. Once the battle is over, it returns to the sea.

name: boltund
desc: This Pokémon generates electricity and channels it into its legs to keep them going strong. Boltund can run nonstop for three full days.

name: rolycoly
desc: Most of its body has the same composition as coal. Fittingly, this Pokémon was first discovered in coal mines about 400 years ago.

name: carkol
desc: By rapidly rolling its legs, it can travel at over 18 mph. The temperature of the flames it breathes exceeds 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: coalossal
desc: It’s usually peaceful, but the vandalism of mines enrages it. Offenders will be incinerated with flames that reach 2,700 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: applin
desc: As soon as it’s born, it burrows into an apple. Not only does the apple serve as its food source, but the flavour of the fruit determines its evolution.

name: flapple
desc: It ate a sour apple, and that induced its evolution. In its cheeks, it stores an acid capable of causing chemical burns.

name: flapple
desc: If it stretches its neck, the strong aroma of its nectar pours out. The scent is so sickeningly sweet that one whiff makes other Pokémon faint.

name: appletun
desc: Its body is covered in sweet nectar, and the skin on its back is especially yummy. Children used to have it as a snack.

name: silicobra
desc: As it digs, it swallows sand and stores it in its neck pouch. The pouch can hold more than 17 pounds of sand.

name: sandaconda
desc: Its unique style of coiling allows it to blast sand out of its sand sac more efficiently.

name: cramorant
desc: This hungry Pokémon swallows Arrokuda whole. Occasionally, it makes a mistake and tries to swallow a Pokémon other than its preferred prey.

name: arrokuda
desc: After it’s eaten its fill, its movements become extremely sluggish. That’s when Cramorant swallows it up.

name: barraskewda
desc: It spins its tail fins to propel itself, surging forward at speeds of over 100 knots before ramming prey and spearing into them.

name: toxel
desc: It manipulates the chemical makeup of its poison to produce electricity. The voltage is weak, but it can cause a tingling paralysis.

name: toxtricity (low key form)
desc: Capable of generating 15,000 volts of electricity, this Pokémon looks down on all that would challenge it.

name: sizzlipede
desc: It wraps prey up with its heated body, cooking them in its coils. Once they’re well-done, it will voraciously nibble them down to the last morsel.

name: centiskorch
desc: While its burning body is already dangerous on its own, this excessively hostile Pokémon also has large and very sharp fangs.

name: centiskorch gigatamax
desc: The heat that comes off a Gigantamax Centiskorch may destabilize air currents. Sometimes it can even cause storms.

name: clobbopus
desc: It’s very curious, but its means of investigating things is to try to punch them with its tentacles. The search for food is what brings it onto land.

name: sinistea (antique form)
desc: The swirl pattern in this Pokémon’s body is its weakness. If it gets stirred, the swirl loses its shape, and Sinistea gets dizzy.

name: polteageist (antique)
desc: When angered, it launches tea from its body at the offender’s mouth. The tea causes strong chills if swallowed.

name: polteageist (phony form)
desc: Leaving leftover black tea unattended is asking for this Pokémon to come along and pour itself into it, turning the tea into a new Polteageist.

name: hatenna
desc: If this Pokémon senses a strong emotion, it will run away as fast as it can. It prefers areas without people.

name: hattrem
desc: No matter who you are, if you bring strong emotions near this Pokémon, it will silence you violently.

name: hatterene
desc: It emits psychic power strong enough to cause headaches as a deterrent to the approach of others.

name: impidimp
desc: It sneaks into people’s homes, stealing things and feasting on the negative energy of the frustrated occupants.

name: morgrem
desc: When it gets down on all fours as if to beg for forgiveness, it’s trying to lure opponents in so that it can stab them with its spear-like hair.

name: grimmsnarl
desc: Its hairs work like muscle fibers. When its hairs unfurl, they latch on to opponents, ensnaring them as tentacles would.

name: obstagoon
desc: It evolved after experiencing numerous fights. While crossing its arms, it lets out a shout that would make any opponent flinch.

name: perrserker
desc: After many battles, it evolved dangerous claws that come together to form daggers when extended.

name: cursola
desc: Be cautious of the ectoplasmic body surrounding its soul. You’ll become stiff as stone if you touch it.

name: sitfetch'd
desc: After deflecting attacks with its hard leaf shield, it strikes back with its sharp leek stalk. The leek stalk is both weapon and food.

name: mr.rime
desc: It’s highly skilled at tap-dancing. It waves its cane of ice in time with its graceful movements.

name: runerigus
desc: Never touch its shadowlike body, or you’ll be shown the horrific memories behind the picture carved into it.

name: milcery
desc: They say that any patisserie visited by Milcery is guaranteed success and good fortune.

name: alcremie (caramel swirl)
desc: The moment it evolved, it took on a bitter flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.

name: alcremie (lemon cream)
desc: The cells that compose its cream fluctuated suddenly during evolution, giving the cream a sour flavor.

name: falinks
desc: The six of them work together as one Pokémon. Teamwork is also their battle strategy, and they constantly change their formation as they fight.

name: pincurchin
desc: It stores electricity in each spine. Even if one gets broken off, it still continues to emit electricity for at least three hours.

name: snom
desc: It eats snow that piles up on the ground. The more snow it eats, the bigger and more impressive the spikes on its back grow.

name: frosmoth
desc: Icy scales fall from its wings like snow as it flies over fields and mountains. The temperature of its wings is less than −290 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: stonjourner
desc: It stands in grasslands, watching the sun’s descent from zenith to horizon. This Pokémon has a talent for delivering dynamic kicks.

name: eiscue
desc: It drifted in on the flow of ocean waters from a frigid place. It keeps its head iced constantly to make sure it stays nice and cold.

name: Penguin Pokémon
desc: It drifted in on the flow of ocean waters from a frigid place. It keeps its head iced constantly to make sure it stays nice and cold.

name: indeedee
desc: It uses the horns on its head to sense the emotions of others. Males will act as valets for those they serve, looking after their every need.

name: morpeko (full belly)
desc: As it eats the seeds stored up in its pocket-like pouches, this Pokémon is not just satisfying its constant hunger. It’s also generating electricity.

name: moreko (hangry mode)
desc: Hunger hormones affect its temperament. Until its hunger is appeased, it gets up to all manner of evil deeds.

name: cufant
desc: It digs up the ground with its trunk. It’s also very strong, being able to carry loads of over five tons without any problem at all.

name: copperajah
desc: They came over from another region long ago and worked together with humans. Their green skin is resistant to water.

name: dracozolt
desc: In ancient times, it was unbeatable thanks to its powerful lower body, but it went extinct anyway after it depleted all its plant-based food sources.

name: arctozolt
desc: This Pokémon lived on prehistoric seashores and was able to preserve food with the ice on its body. It went extinct because it moved so slowly.

name: dracovish
desc: Powerful legs and jaws made it the apex predator of its time. Its own overhunting of its prey was what drove it to extinction.

name: arctovish
desc: The skin on its face is impervious to attack, but breathing difficulties made this Pokémon go extinct anyway.

name: duraludon
desc: Its body resembles polished metal, and it’s both lightweight and strong. The only drawback is that it rusts easily.

name: dreepy
desc: If this weak Pokémon is by itself, a mere child could defeat it. But if Dreepy has friends to help it train, it can evolve and become much stronger.

name: drakloak
desc: It’s capable of flying faster than 120 mph. It battles alongside Dreepy and dotes on them until they successfully evolve.

name: dragapult
desc: When it isn’t battling, it keeps Dreepy in the holes on its horns. Once a fight starts, it launches the Dreepy like supersonic missiles.

name: zacian
desc: Now armed with a weapon it used in ancient times, this Pokémon needs only a single strike to fell even Gigantamax Pokémon.

name: zamazenta
desc: Its ability to deflect any attack led to it being known as the Fighting Master’s Shield. It was feared and respected by all.

name: eternatus
desc: The core on its chest absorbs energy emanating from the lands of the Galar region. This energy is what allows Eternatus to stay active.

name: kubfu
desc: If Kubfu pulls the long white hair on its head, its fighting spirit heightens and power wells up from the depths of its belly.

name: urshifu gigantamax single strike style
desc: People call it the embodiment of rage. It’s said that this Pokémon’s terrifying expression and shout will rid the world of malevolence.

name: zarude
desc: Within dense forests, this Pokémon lives in a pack with others of its kind. It’s incredibly aggressive, and the other Pokémon of the forest fear it.

name: regieleki
desc: This Pokémon is a cluster of electrical energy. It’s said that removing the rings on Regieleki’s body will unleash the Pokémon’s latent power.

name: regidrago
desc: An academic theory proposes that Regidrago’s arms were once the head of an ancient dragon Pokémon. The theory remains unproven.

name: glastrier
desc: Glastrier has tremendous physical strength, and the mask of ice covering its face is 100 times harder than diamond.

name: spectrier
desc: As it dashes through the night, Spectrier absorbs the life-force of sleeping creatures. It craves silence and solitude.

name: calyrex
desc: Calyrex is a merciful Pokémon, capable of providing healing and blessings. It reigned over the Galar region in times of yore.

name: exeggutor
desc: This Pokémon’s psychic powers aren’t as strong as they once were. The head on this Exeggutor’s tail scans surrounding areas with weak telepathy.

name: weezing
desc: This Pokémon consumes particles that contaminate the air. Instead of leaving droppings, it expels clean air.

name: kangaskan
desc: When the mother sees the back of her Mega-Evolved child, it makes her think of the day when her child will inevitably leave her.

name: mr. rime
desc: Its talent is tap-dancing. It can also manipulate temperatures to create a floor of ice, which this Pokémon can kick up to use as a barrier.

name: steelix-mega
desc: It is said that if an Onix lives for over 100 years, its composition changes to become diamond-like.

name: sharpedo-mega
desc: The moment it charges into its opponent, sharp spikes pop out of Sharpedo’s head, leaving its opponent with deep wounds.

name: castform-sunny
desc: Castform changes to this form when it basks in bright sunlight. When you touch its glowing skin, it feels all dried out!

name: castform-rainy
desc: This is Castform’s form when pelted by rain. In an experiment where it was placed in a shower, this Pokémon didn’t change to this form.

name: castform-snowy
desc: This is Castform’s form when caught in a hailstorm. Its whole body is chilled, and its skin is partially frozen!

name: banette -mega
desc: Mega Evolution increases its vindictiveness, and the cursing power that was held back by its zipper comes spilling out.

name: absol-mega
desc: It converts the energy from Mega Evolution into an intimidating aura. Fainthearted people expire from shock at the sight of it.

name: glalie-mega
desc: The power of Mega Evolution was so strong that it smashed Glalie’s jaw. Its inability to eat very well leaves Glalie irritated.

name: salamence-mega
desc: While basking in the joy of flight generally keeps this Pokémon in high spirits, Salamence turns into an uncontrollable menace if something angers it.

name: metagross-mega
desc: When it knows it can’t win, it digs the claws on its legs into its opponent and starts the countdown to a big explosion.

name: cherrim-sunshine
desc: The faint scent that emanates from its full blossom entices bug Pokémon to it.

name: shellos-west
desc: Subjecting this Pokémon to a strong force causes it to secrete a strange purple fluid. Though harmless, the fluid is awfully sticky.

name: gastrodon-west
desc: The softness of its body helps disperse the force of impacts, so although its body is uncommonly squishy, it’s also surprisingly resilient.

name: lopunny-mega
desc: It swings its ears like whips and strikes its enemies with them. It has an intensely combative disposition.

name: garchomp-mega
desc: Its disposition is more vicious than before its Mega Evolution. Garchomp carves its opponents up with the scythes on both arms.

name: lucario-mega
desc: Bathed in explosive energy, its combative instincts have awakened. For its enemies, it has no mercy whatsoever.

name: diglet-alola
desc: The metal-rich geology of this Pokémon’s habitat caused it to develop steel whiskers on its head.

name: dugtrio-alola
desc: Their beautiful, metallic whiskers create a sort of protective helmet on their heads, and they also function as highly precise sensors.

name: meowth-alola
desc: It’s accustomed to luxury because it used to live with Alolan royalty. As a result, it’s very picky about food.

name: meowth-galar
desc: It loves to collect shiny things. If it’s in a good mood, it might even let its Trainer have a look at its hoard of treasures.

name: persian-alola
desc: The round face of Alolan Persian is considered to be a symbol of prosperity in the Alola region, so these Pokémon are very well cared for.

name: Darmanitan-galarian standard
desc: Though it has a gentle disposition, it’s also very strong. It will quickly freeze the snowball on its head before going for a headbutt.

name: darmanitan-galarian zen
desc: Darmanitan takes this form when enraged. It won’t stop spewing flames until its rage has settled, even if its body starts to melt.

name: darmanitan
desc: This Pokémon’s power level rises along with the temperature of its fire, which can reach 2,500 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: darmanitan
desc: When wounded, it stops moving. It goes as still as stone to meditate, sharpening its mind and spirit.

name: charizard-mega-x
desc: The overwhelming power that fills its entire body causes it to turn black and create intense blue flames.

name: charizard-mega-y
desc: Its bond with its Trainer is the source of its power. It boasts speed and maneuverability greater than that of a jet fighter.

name: geodude-alola
desc: Its stone head is imbued with electricity and magnetism. If you carelessly step on one, you’ll be in for a painful shock.

name: graveler-alola
desc: When it comes rolling down a mountain path, anything in its way gets zapped by electricity and sent flying.

name: ponyta-galar
desc: Its small horn hides a healing power. With a few rubs from this Pokémon’s horn, any slight wound you have will be healed.

name: rapidash-galar
desc: Little can stand up to its psycho cut. Unleashed from this Pokémon’s horn, the move will punch a hole right through a thick metal sheet.

name: slowpoke-galar
desc: Although this Pokémon is normally zoned out, its expression abruptly sharpens on occasion. The cause for this seems to lie in Slowpoke’s diet.

name: slowbro-mega
desc: Under the influence of Shellder’s digestive fluids, Slowpoke has awakened, gaining a great deal of power—and a little motivation to boot.

name: slowbro-galar
desc: A Shellder bite set off a chemical reaction with the spices inside Slowbro’s body, causing Slowbro to become a Poison-type Pokémon

name: Dusk Mane Necrozma
desc: When it dominates Solgaleo, it takes on this form. It’s a vicious Pokémon, mangling prey with its many claws—including those on its back.

name: Dawn Wings Necrozma
desc: Necrozma has subjugated Lunala entirely, forcing the unfortunate Pokémon to emit its light energy for Necrozma to consume.

name: utra necrozma
desc: The light pouring out from all over its body affects living things and nature, impacting them in various ways.

name: magearna original colour
desc: It functions thanks to its artificial soul. The vivid decoration is proof that it was presented as a gift to royalty.

name: melmetal gigantamax
desc: In a distant land, there are legends about a cyclopean giant. In fact, the giant was a Melmetal that was flooded with Gigantamax energy.

name: rillaboom gigantamax
desc: Rillaboom has become one with its forest of drums and continues to lay down beats that shake all of Galar.

name: cinderace
desc: Gigantamax energy can sometimes cause the diameter of this Pokémon’s fireball to exceed 300 feet.

name: farfetch'd-galar
desc: The Farfetch’d of the Galar region are brave warriors, and they wield thick, tough leeks in battle

name: drednaw gigantamax
desc: In the Galar region, there’s a tale about this Pokémon chewing up a mountain and using the rubble to stop a flood.

name: coalossal
desc: When Galar was hit by a harsh cold wave, this Pokémon served as a giant heating stove and saved many lives.

name: gengar-mega
desc: It can pass through other dimensions and can appear anywhere. It caused a stir one time when it stuck just one leg out of a wall.

name: appletun gagantamax
desc: Due to Gigantamax energy, this Pokémon’s nectar has thickened. The increased viscosity lets the nectar absorb more damage than before.

name: sandaconda gagantamax
desc: Sand swirls around its body with such speed and power that it could pulverize a skyscraper.

name: cramorant gorging form
desc: This Cramorant has accidentally gotten a Pikachu lodged in its gullet. Cramorant is choking a little, but it isn’t really bothered.

name: cramorant gulping form
desc: The slightest shock is sometimes enough to get this Pokémon to spit out the Arrokuda lodged in its throat.

name: toxricity gagantamax
desc: Out of control after its own poison penetrated its brain, it tears across the land in a rampage, contaminating the earth with toxic sweat.

name: toxtricity amped form
desc: This short-tempered and aggressive Pokémon chugs stagnant water to absorb any toxins it might contain.

name: sinistea (phony)
desc: This Pokémon is said to have been born when a lonely spirit possessed a cold, leftover cup of tea.

name: hatterene gigantamax
desc: Beams like lightning shoot down from its tentacles. It’s known to some as the Raging Goddess.

name: alcremie (salted cream)
desc: The cells that compose its cream fluctuated suddenly during evolution, giving the cream a salty flavor.

name: grimmsnarl gigantamax
desc: Gigantamax energy has caused more hair to sprout all over its body. With the added strength, it can jump over the world’s tallest building.

name: alcremie gigantamax
desc: Cream pours endlessly from this Pokémon’s body. The cream stiffens when compressed by an impact. A harder impact results in harder cream.

name: alcremie (vanilla cream)
desc: When Alcremie is content, the cream it secretes from its hands becomes sweeter and richer.

name: alcremie (lemon cream)
desc: The cells that compose its cream fluctuated suddenly during evolution, giving the cream an aromatic flavor.

name: alcremie (mint)
desc: The moment it evolved, it took on a refreshing flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.

name: alcremie (rainbow swirl)
desc: The moment it evolved, it took on a complex flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.

name: alcremie (ruby swirl)
desc: The moment it evolved, it took on a mixed flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.

name: alcremie (ruby cream)
desc: The cells that compose its cream fluctuated suddenly during evolution, giving the cream a sweet and tart flavor.

name: eiscue noice face
desc: The ice covering this Pokémon’s face has shattered, revealing a slightly worried expression that many people are enamored with.

name: copperajah gigantanax
desc: So much power is packed within its trunk that if it were to unleash that power, the resulting blast could level mountains and change the landscape.

name: grimer-alola
desc: It has a passion for trash above all else, speedily digesting it and creating brilliant crystals of sparkling poison.

name: duraludon gigantamax
desc: It’s grown to resemble a skyscraper. Parts of its towering body glow due to a profusion of energy.

name: zacian hero of battles
desc: This Pokémon has slumbered for many years. Some say it’s Zamazenta’s elder sister—others say the two Pokémon are rivals.

name: zamazenta hero of many battles
desc: This Pokémon slept for aeons while in the form of a statue. It was asleep for so long, people forgot that it ever existed.

name: muk-alola
desc: Muk’s coloration becomes increasingly vivid the more it feasts on its favorite dish—trash

name: eternatus eternamax
desc: Infinite amounts of energy pour from this Pokémon’s enlarged core, warping the surrounding space-time.

name: urshifu single strike style
desc: Inhabiting the mountains of a distant region, this Pokémon races across sheer cliffs, training its legs and refining its moves.

name: urshifu gigantamax rapid strike style
desc: As it waits for the right moment to unleash its Gigantamax power, this Pokémon maintains a perfect one-legged stance. It won’t even twitch.

name: urshifu rapid strike style
desc: This form of Urshifu is a strong believer in defeating foes by raining many blows down on them. Its strikes are nonstop, flowing like a river.

name: zarude dada form
desc: This Zarude’s special strength stems from its love and care for an orphaned human child that the Pokémon has raised since the child’s infancy.

name: calyrex ice rider
desc: It’s said that this Pokémon once moved a large forest—and all the Pokémon living there—to a new location overnight.

name: calyrex shadow rider
desc: It’s said that Calyrex and a Pokémon that had bonded with it ran all across the Galar region to bring green to the wastelands.

name: blastoise-mega
desc: The cannon on its back is as powerful as a tank gun. Its tough legs and back enable it to withstand the recoil from firing the cannon.
